SELECT p.id as id, p.time as time,
p.user_id AS usr_id, u.login AS usr_login,
p.film_id AS flm_id, f.name AS flm_name, f.genre AS flm_genre, f.duration AS flm_duration, f.price AS flm_price, f.image AS flm_image,
p.discount_id AS dsc_id, d.code AS dsc_code, d.value AS dsc_value FROM payments AS p INNER JOIN users AS u ON p.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN films AS f ON p.film_id = f.id LEFT JOIN discounts AS d ON p.discount_id = d.id
